2025-09-01.content: You can now [distribute live stream content to remote endpoints](https://cloud.google.com/livestream/docs/how-to/distribute-live-streams) by using the Secure Reliable Transport (SRT) protocol or the Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP).

summary.title: Live stream content distribution
summary.summary: You can now distribute live stream content to remote endpoints using SRT or RTMP protocols.

2025-09-01.content: You can now [create AI-generated captions and translated captions](https://cloud.google.com/livestream/docs/how-to/configure-captions-and-translations) for a live stream.

summary.title: AI-powered captions for live streams
summary.summary: You can now create AI-generated captions and translated captions for your live stream.

2025-09-01.content: Added support for UHD (4K) inputs and outputs.

summary.title: UHD Support Added
summary.summary: We've added support for UHD (4K) inputs and outputs.

2025-09-01.content: Added support for [H.265 (HEVC) inputs and outputs](https://cloud.google.com/livestream/docs/how-to/create-channels#create_channel_h265), which allows for more efficient compression.

summary.title: HEVC Support Added
summary.summary: We've added support for H.265 (HEVC) inputs and outputs. This new feature allows for more efficient compression.

2025-09-01.content: You can now generate Web Video Text Tracks format (WebVTT) subtitles from cea608 or cea708 embedded captions in the input stream.

summary.title: WebVTT subtitles from embedded captions
summary.summary: Generate WebVTT subtitles from cea608 or cea708 captions in your video streams.

2025-09-01.content: You can now update the encryption key of your encrypted live stream contents while the channel is running.

summary.title: Update encryption key of live stream content
summary.summary: You can now update the encryption key of your encrypted live stream contents while the channel is running.

2025-09-01.content: You can now preview your input streams with ultra-low latency, which allows you to take corrective actions and maintain high-quality viewing experience for your viewers.

summary.title: Ultra-low latency stream preview
summary.summary: Preview your input streams with ultra-low latency to take corrective actions and maintain high-quality viewing experience.
